column2: an A.M. Eatery////This food was very good. The hill mountain mule was good
column3: it could have been a bit sweeter. My friend loved the droppin beetz cocktail
column5: just wasn't my cup of tea. I did the pancake trio
column8: and pineapple upside down. Pineapple upside down was perfect
column9: blueberry had too much icing and then had icing in the middle...it should be no icing wit blueberry sauce or something
column10: the special of the day was good. My fried got a sandwich which was good
column12: but check my pics :-). Saturday: it was super packed
